website_summaries.verdict: Built to enhance athletic performance but flexible enough for at-home workouts.
pros: Customers rave about the many handles and creative use
Attain a high impact workout in just 10 minutes
Durable outer shell with secure zipper closure
cons: Fabric may not withstand extreme weight

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag - but ripped on first use
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to receive the product and went through the trouble of buying sand and then putting the sandbags into the bigger sandbag. All good and expected. But then I was very disappointed to hear a 'rip' as I lifted the bag for the first time... The stitching on the horizontal handles came apart. I was able to finish the workout but c'mon, these bags are supposed to be made for rough use - multiple rough use. It should not even be remotely possible that it might rip on the first use. Anyway, I've ordered an exchange. Let's see what the next bag is like. Stay tuned...
customer_reviews.author: A. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: It's Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an addition to our home gym. Hard plastic handles are uncomfortable and lend to pinching. It lasted 2 weeks and 3 workouts before the inside bag broke. I emailed the company seeking a replacement bag and still no response (2 weeks waiting). in short its a junk product and the company suffers any customer support. Too bad I can't give negative star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: W User

customer_reviews.title: A new idea.  NO CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Plenty of handles for a wide range of motion. A little tight for 4 bags with 9 lbs each I'm glad I didn't try to get 10 lbs in each bag. After reading the reviews I decided zip lock sand was the way to go. The thing is the zip lock bag is dimensioned differently than the sandbag after a few minutes I gave up. The better idea I had was to take Gorilla tape around each 10 lbs bag in two directions. This should provide enough additional reinforcement at the seams. Time will tell. Additionally, I don't plan to slam the bag on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Endarkened

customer_reviews.title: Choose another bag
customer_reviews.text: Set up the duffel bag and got ready for my first use. Before I started, I noticed that one of horizontal straps was already pulled away from the bag, and the yellow threads showing. Started the workout I heard a rip. Sure enough the strap had pulled away more. If the bag was like that before I started, got worse after my first use with only 20 lbs in the bag, it is NOT going to last long, especially as I add more of the weighted inserts added. This bag is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let these negative, crazy reviews fool you. Some people can't do or use things properly. I live near the beach so just brought a scale and filled all 4 bags. Perfect. Then I shoved all 4 bags into the outer shell. Perfect. Easy. First use, I threw this bag aaaaall up and down my back yard and burned 800 calories in 2 hours. This bag is so great and sturdy. I've been using it for quite a while now and I absolutely love it. I would recommend for everyone looking for a 10-40lbs bag. Easily adjustable. The bag is sagging in the picture because I only have 2 of the 4 bags in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: This bag is smaller in length than others I looked at but it seems pretty well built. I filled the bags about 95% to capacity with sand (just below the line where the inside Velcro starts) and had no problem fitting all 4 in and zippering shut. To be clear, this bag isn’t meant for slamming like a med ball. If you use it for that, it’ll probably rip. But the handles are sturdy and rigid and well placed. I’m really happy with this little bag!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not standing up to snuff so far
customer_reviews.text: Have used this bag 5 times and had this blowout today. Tried to find the product website and get a 404 error Hoping this less than stellar review will prompt some correspondence
customer_reviews.author: Sivai Mertyris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sand Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product after reading numerous reviews. Filled weight bags with Aquarium Gravel from Walmart and no leakage issues what so ever. Trying to do work-out/ exercises in Men's Health Book- Push, Pull, Swing. This bag will really give you a workout and is well made with numerous handles for different types of grip and exercises. If you watch the SKLZ video on how to put the weight bags in the bag they fit with no real issues- just a tight fit. If you are looking for a full body workout and do not want to spend alot of money on exercise equipment I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beat a ’Bhèist

customer_reviews.title: This device along with the excellent website videos will challenge the same old movements you ...
customer_reviews.text: This may wake you up. This device along with the excellent website videos will challenge the same old movements you thought you have done a thousand times correctly. This device is basically an unbalanced load. And, the center of gravity is subject to a slight shifting as you move through a motion. So, if you are slightly off center joint and/or not balancing the load well, your secondary muscles wake up and contribute to moving this object in a stable, flowing manner throughout the movement. In contrast, these same secondary muscles and fascia can easily lie idle when using balanced kettle bells, traditional weights or resistance bands. This device puts the fun and challenge back into movement.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. M.

customer_reviews.title: NO SKLZ is more like it
customer_reviews.text: The bag ripped on March 3, 2020 - the very first time I used it. I contacted the company right away... sent emails, photos, and the purchase receipt to "Jurrell Coach" and was told via email on March 9, 2020 that a replacement was on its way and would be to me in "a week or so". April 26, 2020 and I still have not received a replacement, nor have I received any further communication. I realize there are a lot of things going on but this all occurred before any shutdown. I'll avoid SKLZ products in the future and you should too.
customer_reviews.author: JD3MEDIC

customer_reviews.title: Mini bags don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality sandbag. However the mini bags inside will not all fit in the bag. You have to fill them all the way to get 10lbs but then they won't all fit in the bag. Had to empty some out so total weight of my sandbag is around 32lbs. It's not possible to get all 40lbs. Unless maybe filling it with a mixture of lead shots/pellets and sand which is what I might do to make it heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Aliah Khalid Alsarraf

customer_reviews.title: It’s workable and does its job/sand bag themselves suck
customer_reviews.text: Almost 5 months now and holding up pretty good with 4-5x a week workouts.. the sand bags they come with are junk and all have leaking sand, tried to fix them by wrapping with gorilla tape which made them like rocks. Ended up getting corn hole bags(36 to be exact, for a total of 36 lbs) which made duffle more comfortable and bulky plush like. I don’t slam this bag so time will tell how the new fill will work out. Otherwise durable and useful and sometimes the hard handles rub on the chest with certain exercises, but those hard handles make grabbing the bag easier so I don’t mind that minor detail.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Feels very durable
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy construction. The sand bags themselves seem very durable. They have a strong velcro closure although for peace of mind you may still want to use duct tape or something. Each sand bag has a handle so if you really wanted to you could use them as individual weights. My 4 bags are each filled with 10 pounds of sand. Bought a 50 pound bag for $4 at my local home improvement store.
customer_reviews.author: Xenli

customer_reviews.title: Duffle bag not big enough and a bag seam busted wide open!
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited to workout at home with my new sandbag set. I got through one workout....and the seam on one of the bags splits right in half! 😡 Also, I couldn’t get all 4 bags to fit in the duffle once they were full of sand! How am I supposed to work up to 40lb when it won’t even whole all of them?! I guess it makes sense for one to break since it only holds 3 anyways 😑 Other than that, the duffle was comfortable to lift and hold and the different handle placements are good.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Started tearing during 1st circuit.
customer_reviews.text: I was pumped to support a local SD company and I’ve gotten some other great items from them but I’m disappointed with this sandbag. It ripped in the first workout. Just going through the exercises suggested in the supplied pamphlet. The inline handles for curls started to tear at the connection point. Can’t believe it’s not stitched in an X pattern for strength both directions you use the handles. Also I kind of wish the straps weren’t so long for better overhead stability.
customer_reviews.author: Daver

customer_reviews.title: Only use this product as a weighted bag. Do not toss it around.
customer_reviews.text: The sandbags inside broke the first time I used this product. Do not do any tossing or ball like slam moves with this product as the sandbags are not durable. Use a weighted ball instead. I made the mistake of incorporating tossing the bag over my head in my workout and it was a big mistake. I'm currently looking into replacement bags for the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla S.

customer_reviews.title: amazing train with it
customer_reviews.text: incredible, it's the only word I could find to describe the great satisfaction it has given me... the product complies with what the seller describes, it is not a false promise, it is adaptable, and comfortable, I simply love it
customer_reviews.author: rox

customer_reviews.title: Ok....but won't hold 40#
customer_reviews.text: The internal sandbags (4) are made of thick material with a double Velcro closure. Each bag is listed to hold 10#. I couldn't fit more than 9 pounds inside each bag otherwise the double Velcro closure wouldn't fasten. I guess you could add more and just use one closure but I'm not sure if that would be sufficient to seal the bags. Rearranging the sandbags inside the main bag wasn't bad...took some manipulation. There's still a bit of room in the main bag which I'll probably fill with a homemade duct tape bag of sand. Not sure how the handles will hold up...gonna find out soon. Wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality sand bag and once you know how to load the sand bags it is a breeze to load and unload the internal sand bags to adjust the weight. This link will help  otherwise you will find it difficult to load and become frustrated. SKLZ sand is durable and I use it about four days a week. I do take care of my equipment so that may be the reason mind has lasted over a year and has not leaked any sand. Great product and I am buying a second one so I can have two for squats and balanced weight when training sand bags and stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold 40 pounds, only 30
customer_reviews.text: It's not possible to put all four sand bags in the sack. I've tried numerous ways and it just doesn't happen. It appears to be well made, the handles are nice, it's just that the bag isn't big enough to hold all four sand bags. Also, it should have more padding since the sand bags have sharp edges that dig into your shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Ronando

customer_reviews.title: Ripped seams leave sand mess
customer_reviews.text: Tried this sandbag as it was similar to one I’d used at the gym. As others have reported getting the 4bags of sand into it was a challenge but the most disappointing was the way one of the internal bags ripped at the seams making a mess of my gym area. You’d think they could have reinforced the seams.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Sand bags are defective
customer_reviews.text: The sandbags are defective. Sand continues to fall out the side of the bags; thus, getting into my clients’ eyes. Other than that, I like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the seams ripped open
customer_reviews.text: All the seams of every single sand bag inside ripped open after only two weeks of use! This is a very poorly constructed product. I would like to get a refund on this product but I do not seen an option for a refund on my orders for some reason. Very disappointed in the construction of the product.
customer_reviews.author: jessica dehart

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a money
customer_reviews.text: this I s just a bag, where is the weight or the sand? you did not mention weight is not included, what I'm going to do with a bag? now I'm going to spend more money and find a place who's selling a weight sand
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Romasanta

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: This bag of sand is so versatile! I use it for circuit intervals. I can work my biceps, triceps, pecks, back, and legs--all with one set of weights. The yellow bags were fairly easy to fill. Make sure to leave a space at the top to securely velcro them shut. All four bags fit into the duffle, but it is a pain to get them in there--don't plan on taking them in and out during work-outs. So far, I haven't had any issues with sand leaking out. I don't drop if very hard though, which is probably the only way I can think of for the leaks. FYI, sand for the bag cost me about $3 from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. F

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality canvas.
customer_reviews.text: A great workout by no means. SKLZ makes some great products, but this one is beginning to show some signs of wear and tear after only a few uses. I attached two pictures. Seems the stitching is holding up, but the canvas is searing holes in it. I do not drag this product across concrete or black top. I do though use it in the yard. I would say I am unhappy with the quality and am extremely unhappy I can't return it. I would love to speak with customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Dahleen

customer_reviews.title: Good product but could use an update.
customer_reviews.text: Gray product but sand bag size is odd. Should run full length of the bag for stability and maintaining form. Definitely durable but sand bag can make it awkward once full. Handles made of hard plastic and can crack.
customer_reviews.author: michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Utter Garbage!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a sand bag for aesthetics for your gym this is a great buy. If you plan on using this bag in your gym you’d be better off purchasing a trash bag. I’ve had this bag less than 90 days and I’m already using duct tape to hold the handles and bag together.
customer_reviews.author: Dawglover04

customer_reviews.title: Great workout!
customer_reviews.text: It's is an awesome bag, perfect size for a petite woman like me, and it would probably be even easier to manage for a man. Best workouts to use with the bag I thing are squats and deadlifts, but you really could do anything with it with so many handles. It is super sturdy, nothing is ripping or coming apart. I bought sand and filled it in quart sized zip locks and then taped around the zip locks completely and then placed them in the yellow sandbags. It took 2 quart sized ziplocks to fit in 1 sandbag. I weight it and it was just under 10 lbs. No leaking of sand whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: F Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Does it meet max capacity.
customer_reviews.text: You cannot fit all four of the smaller bags inside the one large bag. If you fill the adjustable bags to 10lbs each they will not zip shut into the large main bag. The bag is sturdy but will not carry the weight advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Fun to train with!
customer_reviews.text: This offers a completely different type of exercise than anything I've done before. Yes, it's a bit messy to load, but it didn't cost very much either (I bought play sand from the hardware store). The only downside is that it is a pain to lug to different training locations (I am a trainer who takes my clients outside to a track/football field and it is very awkward to lug around). However, it seems like it's a fun way to train and definitely challenging. If you can store it somewhere close to where you train (e.g., garage), it seems like it would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for about a month. It seems pretty durable so far. You can get a total body workout with a handful of exercises everyday with one of these. It gives you a great workout if you find the right exercises to do. I agree with some of the other reviews in that it is tough to get all of the individual bags in when filled. Once things "break in" a bit though from use - it becomes more flexible and easier to use. I filled mine with aquarium gravel instead of stand. Go on youtube and find some of the exercise routines people are using with them to get the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: You probably want a more durable bag than this one if you actually plan to use it,
customer_reviews.text: The skillz bag is a decent design but lacks the durability to use long term. 1 month report of 3x a week use is not great. While it is a good bag to use it’s starting to fall apart at the seems already.
customer_reviews.author: K in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: versatile
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a gift and washed pea gravel to fill the 10-pound pouches. We purchased pea gravel, rinsed it, let it dry, packed it into plastic bags and inserted the plastic bag of pea gravel into the pouch. So far the recipient likes the performance of the SKLZ Super Sandbag - Heavy Duty Training Weight Bag. It's sturdy and versatile - you don't have to use the whole 10 pounds in any one of the pouches, either - our recipient has mixed it up with a couple of 10 pound pouches and a five pound pouch. The pouches in particular seem VERY tough and that's definitely industrial-grade velcro :)
customer_reviews.author: Western NC

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable, but quality and durability is lacking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sandbag to add variety to my workouts. During my second use, the sandbag stitching on the side handle tore. I heard it rip while performing sandbag swings. I was under the impression that this bag was meant for multiple common exercises. I expect wear and tear to happen with time, but I was frustrated to see that the quality of the bag was not to my expectations. I am hoping a replacement bag can be obtained at no additional charge. Even though the cost is very affordable, I would seek other options that have higher durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bag, my only issues is that since there are 4 little bags that you fill they tend to be uncomfortable on the neck when running with them
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Der Torosian

customer_reviews.title: I am STILL delighted with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag in October 2015. I am STILL delighted with it. I use it at max capacity every other day with jump roping and I am seeing lovely changes all over. This bag is just simply more holistic than other hard weights. It is also versatile beyond words. I refer to tons of YT videos for inventive ways to use my bag. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had it forever but really like this. Lots of handling options and the weight is easy to change.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it forever but really like this. Lots of handling options and the weight is easy to change. I wrap my inner sandbags in some old clothes, because the corners of the inner bags can be quite stiff and stab you in the shoulder when you shoulder the bag. Followed the procedure online to pack the bag and it was no hassle really.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great sandbag!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! I had a homemade sandbag for years, but I couldn't get the handles just right, so I finally broke down & purchased this sandbag from SKLZ. This was the first product I have purchased from them & I love it! I'm using the same amount of weight but the with the weight distribution & the arrangement of handles I can really feel the difference! I had to hunt down the video of how to pack it because there is no instruction in the box or on their website, & if you pack every pouch it can get tricky:  Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: CheshireSmiles

customer_reviews.title: Sand bags that come with it look like they can't hold 10lbs of sand
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it looks in the picture. Sand bags that come with it look like they can't hold 10lbs of sand, maybe rock. I have not used it yet and can't wait to do so. It is quality made and believe it will do exactly what I bought it for. I am a beginner in sand bag training. I like the quality so much though I bought one for my son (Air Force TACP) for a Christmas present.The one start mark down is due to size, I expected it to be larger.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Packing the sand bags
customer_reviews.text: After 30 minutes packing the sand bags and emptying them to TRY to make the 4 bags fit in the big bag was Frustrating! I can see the purpose of the individual bags as isolated weights fr different exercises. But, I eventually emptied out all four bags and put a strong garbage bag in the big Main bag and filled it up with more that 40lbs in fact 55lbs to be exact! Now i'm happy using it and no leakage of any sand...and most of all no frustration in packing the Big Main Bag!
customer_reviews.author: K. Eng

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Internal sandbags busted open after first time use, LIGHT USE! Bought two, didn’t even bother filling the other one.
customer_reviews.author: The Big P-Rock

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I highly recommend this product for those who never played in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I started playing in the sand as soon as it was delivered. The only thing I'm not a fan of are the sand pouches. After filling them I had a tough time placing them inside the sandbag. Other than that I highly recommend this product for those who never played in the sand box as a child.
customer_reviews.author: Xerxes

customer_reviews.title: Broke during my first work out
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. I was doing my first sandbag workout with it. I was doing a work out I found on their website. One of the handles on the end ripped off. Two of the bags inside busted open at the seam, which left sand in the bag and poured sand out all over the floor. I will never buy this sand bag again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Wexler

customer_reviews.title: Comes in handy
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I had was putting the sand bags in the duffel a bit of Tetris to get them in
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple...but interior bags not designed with outer bag in mind
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a great product and does what it is supposed to. The only minor problem with it is that the 10lb bags that go into it were difficult to put in together. The outer bag wasn't clearly designed to fit these minor bags when full (used play sand from Home Depot). With time and force, I eventually got them all in. However, if the outer bag was designed better, this wouldn't have been an issue. Overall, it's tough and does what it's supposed to once set up.
customer_reviews.author: G. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Stitches are popping already!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this 2 weeks and the stiches on the handles are popping already....went to do a press and the handle started to tear with only 30 lbs in it... otherwise i think it is a good product... do not know how long it will hold up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag in HIIT training and find it to be super versatile. The bag is very durable and the handles are well placed. I use it for kettle bell swings too. The only issue is that I used playground sand to fill each filler bag and they hold less than 10 lbs each. Also, when all filler bags are filled to capacity they do not fit inside the sandbag. This isn't a huge issue for me since i'm a small girl and find the weight to be enough. Overall, I love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: livnbhappy

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags exploded
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using the SKLZ Super Sandbag the past few months and have been loving it till today when i was doing a work out i had slammed it down and sand blew out of the outter bag to open it up to reveal that two of the inner bags exlploded im a little upset because i had to sweep up all the sand at the gym. The bag opened at the bottom and not at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas DelVecchio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality for the value!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has been doing Crossfit for about 6 months and has gone bonkers on getting a gym set up with all the latest coolest workout equipment he can fit into our 1 bdrm apt! Best part about crossfit is that the equipment is simple from jumpropes, kettle balls, boxes for jumps etc. it doesn't take up too much space. He wanted to add sand bags to his collection and found this set on Amazon for a very reasonable price. The quality of the bags are great and will stand the weight it says it will. We love it and highly recommend this product to fellow workout junkies!
customer_reviews.author: D. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for working out at home!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed the flexability of this bag. You can lift it, swing it, do squats with it and control the weight for the type of workout you want. Lots of sturdy handles!! I bought sand, put them in plastic baggies and put duct tape around them, and used that for the weights. I did it in 5lb increments so I can add and subtract the weight by smaller increments. The bag is small, and easily fits behind my sofa between workouts. I love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: tkitchens

customer_reviews.title: Conditioning tool.
customer_reviews.text: Just a great tool to work out with! You can use indoors or outside. Better than dragging traditional weights around. Add your own weight from 10 to 40 lbs.👍
customer_reviews.author: Robert 904

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: If you're willing to get off the couch and work this will work for you!!! It's tough and has stood up to my son and I thrashing it every day for about 1 month. Just look up different workouts to do and get creative!!!
customer_reviews.author: G2332

customer_reviews.title: I cannot WAIT!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so thrilled!!! I have been wanting one of these for a long time and the price for the quality is wonderful! The bag is strong, great quality, durable as well as the sand bags are durable as the handles are great to have for individual crunches!!! The only thing I am not to ok with is the sand kind of gets out of the little bags. I cannot wait to see results from working out with this!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Until the filler sand bag broke open...
customer_reviews.text: ...I really liked this sand bag;until just a few days ago. I have had this for only a couple months and use it once or twice per week. Then, one of the four filler bags split completely open inside the main bag during a workout. The first issue is the apparent lack of disability of the filler bags which I could overlook if I could simply replace the filler bag with an identical replacement. Until then,I have to rate one star as the bag is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: George T.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sand bag
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sand bag. The handles are well stitched onto the bag and the 4 pouches that came with the bag held about 10lbs. of sand per pouch. After using this for about 6 months, i have no wear and tear from this product. I would highly recommend this for anyone who wants the versatility to add or remove weights in their training regime.
customer_reviews.author: Kwok F Su

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is well made and good value. I was able to get 5kg (11lbs) of sand into each of the four bags for a finished total bag weight of 20.5kg (45lbs).Had no problems fitting the four yellow bags into the main bag. I have taped the small bags with heavy duty cloth reinforced tape and do not expect to have any problems with sand leakage over time. I believe that quality issues mentioned by others in older posts have been addressed and am looking forward to a long and fruitful training experience....will update with any issues if they arise...
customer_reviews.author: colimcf

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The bag is a little small and hard to get all 4 bags in, but it will work. Also, the yellow bags sometimes leak sand. Overall it is a great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Jones

customer_reviews.title: Well built and effective excercise tool
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the only that is that the sand bags are difficult to close once filled and they become very hard if filled all the way. I am not sure how you could get 10lbs of sand in each bag, and all four bags inside of the main compartment once filled.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Comes in handy to have my own sand bags during exercise class. Sturdy product
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: It was a struggle to fit all four bags, but after numerous tries, was finally able to make them fit. Very excited!
customer_reviews.author: Marsimone1

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and literally 5 minutes into the first use, 2 of the 4 sandbags busted. I even weighed out 10 lbs of sand to try to make sure this didn’t happen. I tried calling customer service and after about 5 minutes hung up. I’m get it’s a cheap bag, but come on.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Well made and ready for a workout
customer_reviews.text: This is a rugged bag and is very well made. The outer bag has handles in the right places and the inner bags have enough velcro to keep sand in.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Handsome

customer_reviews.title: Great quality #sashafit
customer_reviews.text: . My daughter loves trading with this bag. She is just a beginner so this bag provided every she needed and is made of good quality. #sashafit
customer_reviews.author: Stoney V Godet

customer_reviews.title: Good except for one small, yet annoying detail
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife, since she started working out indoors. She loves it! It allows her to do all the exercises she needs. It looks and feels like it's built to last, however, I have just one complaint. Every time she finishes working out, I notice a small amount of sand on the floor. Turns out the small weight bags inside unfortunately are not 'leak proof'. I would probably put each of them inside a plastic bag to keep the sand from spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Galgon

customer_reviews.title: Adjusted weight!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great and I love that you can adjust the weight!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M. Pettyjohn

customer_reviews.title: Nice add to the workout collection
customer_reviews.text: Good size, pretty durable. Grips helps give diverse range of exercises to perform. * Got good quality sand for a few dollars at Lowe's for the inner bags. Getting all four to fit together is a bit of a challenge, strongly suggest dbl bagging the sand to prevent leaks.
customer_reviews.author: natasha ormsby

customer_reviews.title: Ripped first use
customer_reviews.text: I was super exited about this bag when it arrived. During our first workout two of the inserts ripped and sand was pouring out. We ordered a replacement, hopefully it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Best

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: not use yet, its comming home with me to Philippines, I will probably fill with cheap rice and use. But the quaty is 5 star, looks feels like you can really beat to hell for many months and will hold up better than you. haha
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Busted
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase these bags. I have only used these bags once and it busted open. These are a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag is not as durable as I had originally ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not as durable as I had originally thought. I use it in a boot camp class that I teach. It was Ok until I took the class outside. Now it is full of holes.
customer_reviews.author: Bug 1987

customer_reviews.title: Nice training addition to my other equipment reasonably priced decent ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice training addition to my other equipment reasonably priced decent construction should hold up well as long as you use it as inteneded if you plan on throwing it around and slamming it you might want to look for a heavier duty bag but for my uses its been superb filled it with pea gravel sand would be an utter disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. So easy to use for myself or with clients. Unbelievable versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Zenga

customer_reviews.title: Had bag one year. One of the internal sand ...
customer_reviews.text: Had bag one year. One of the internal sand holding bags opened at the seam making it impossible to hold sand. The black external bag that holds the individual smaller bags has several tears which I used tape to patch as well as the internal lining of this bag is pealing and breaking down. Cheaply made bag that really hasn't lasted at all.
customer_reviews.author: Qubabe

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Rugged and thoughtful design. Using play sand without any leakage. No problem getting all four sandbags in master bag. Love the single handle on each sandbag for individual use as well. Have no concern throwing this down on the ground or keeping it indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: not a good product
customer_reviews.text: was excited and waited a month to get this bag only to use it one time and all the sand started falling out. 3 of the four bags all busted at the seams. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have had my bag for other a month, using it 4-5 times a week. I used pea pebbles as filler with no problems. I did have holes begin to develop on the polar ends & the bag was underweight. I contacted the company via email & they quickly responded & sent a replacement. I think the bag is great, I just won't carry it that much holding the polar ends...otherwise it takes quite a beating. It is great that the company stands by its product and does not haggle with customers who have had the bag show wear & tear too early under usual conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for multiple exercises. I really like the multiple handle placements for versatility. It was a little cumbersome to fill the bags with exact weight, but after creating a funnel type system and using tiny rocks (not sand), it ending up being ok. I appreciate being able to pull out 10lbs at a time and use just those as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny5309

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The construction of the outer bag is great. The construction of the inner bags are great. Its durable and the handles are placed well. Cons: It is very difficult to get the bag to weigh 40lbs (only got mine up to 30lbs) When the inner bags are totally full they are hard to fit into the outer bag.
customer_reviews.author: Peloton Dad

customer_reviews.title: Best addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I get great cardio/strength training out of this bad boy. Due to the other reviews I used aquarium rocks. The small almost sand like pebbles, because if that its only 38lbs total but I have no issues with leaks and even being 2lbs shy of 40lbs I can still get a killer workout.
customer_reviews.author: Stahl

customer_reviews.title: ) I used rice and duct taped small packages to make it easy to add and subtract weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag over a year ago and use it with many different clients, it is very durable. Many slams, flips and swings - the zipper is still in tact and the bag has no holes :) I used rice and duct taped small packages to make it easy to add and subtract weight. Duct tape ziplock bags completely, rice will break through. When I need to add a lot of weigh, I add ankle weights - they are perfect to bring up the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: great exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: You need this item if you are new to circuit training like me. The individual sand bags are a convenient way to easily increase or decrease weight for each exercise depending on your endurance level. The velcro fastening on the sand bags do allow fine sand to sift out so simply fill the bags until they weigh 10 lbs, then use duct tape to seal them. Done. All 4 bags fit nicely in the strong canvas shell. A great product at a great price! It can also be used on vacation: bring empty, fill with sand on the beach, then empty and use as a shoe bag or carry-on luggage for your flight back home.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Real Cross training
customer_reviews.text: FAVE WORKOUT BUDDY! Love the added resistance and the cross training you can get in with this bag! NO rips tears or complaints, I love the handles and perfect size - I'm a 5' tall female
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Contrary to other review all bags fit fine when used with pea gravel, also inserted small 2 lb weights from old weighted vest. Has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: joe aguilar

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: It lasted about two months when it supposed to be made for a long time and I sent them en email to see if they could change it for me and they didn’t reply. Never trusting this brand again...
customer_reviews.author: Lester

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, I used rice to fill the bags ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I used rice to fill the bags since I saw that people had problems with the sand leaking and so far that has worked great, no leaks and I've been using it for couple months now
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pierce

customer_reviews.title: great item, great price.
customer_reviews.text: this product will do the job on amping up your workouts at a great low price, i started out with using Rice for a few months due to recovering from shoulder surgery , then i took out the rice and used sand, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: I filled up each inner bag with 10 lbs. each and made sure by weighing them. Trying to get the 4 bags inside the actual sandbag, forget about it. Not happening. I called the Skilz number and left a message explaining my problem and never received a call back. I decided that I didn't want to go through the BS of sending it back and wrote it off as a life lesson. Just bought a Rogue fitness sandbag, that's the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Plourde

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold weight properly
customer_reviews.text: Broke one 10 lb sand bag that barely holds that much. All 40 lb don’t fit nicely at all. I will need to make one bag of sand to fit in this shell.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for about a year of almost daily use.
customer_reviews.text: This sandbag is just ok. I fill with 40lbs, and that's just about busting at the seams. I use it almost daily and my workouts consist of HIIT. I do rough the bag up a bit with some throwing down and dragging. But, I wouldn't say that I abuse it. It lasted just under a year. The fabric is tearing in several places, one handle came off, and sand does blow in your face every time you clean and press it. Anyway, for the money its worth it. 40 bucks and it will last about a year. I just got my 3rd one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: the price is good, the handles are all in the correct places and i had little issue stuffing the sandbags inside. the only issue i see is that one corner is starting to pull apart. I will update this review if it gets worse.
customer_reviews.author: brandon sarkis

customer_reviews.title: Love the Sandbag
customer_reviews.text: Love the Sandbag. Only thing is the pouches do not hold a full 10 pounds of sand and of course it's sand so you will have a little sand fall out of the bags. It also took me a couple of times to figure out to actually place the bags in their perfectly to fit all four. But after I figured it out endless uses to this bag. I have all my clients use it and they love/hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed outer bag with multiple handholds. Inner bags leak a little but I've never found anything that completely keeps sand from leaking. Working out with a sand bag definitely ups the intensity of the workout.
customer_reviews.author: AlexO

customer_reviews.title: bag too small
customer_reviews.text: false product advertising. barely fits and zips closed three bags when filled. You can fit four bags but useless for workouts a capacity is too small to approximate zipper
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Xagoraris Md

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Despite it saying that the bags do no leak, I've experienced that they do. It seems to leave sprinkles of sand everywhere now every time I use it. I now can only use it outdoors so that I won't get my apartment of gym floor dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s not very useful as it only comes with one or two sand bags. There is no where that I found that I can buy the sand bags from.
customer_reviews.author: Ihab

customer_reviews.title: not so great  :(
customer_reviews.text: I own a small gym and have used these for 2 months and just last night the inner yellow bags exploded, creating the bags to release dust from the sand that spilled inside the bags. hopinf for something more resistant. For light use they may be ok.
customer_reviews.author: E. Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag a lot price is right and is super thoug. For people starting on crossfit this is a helpful tool
customer_reviews.author: Caliatus

customer_reviews.title: My favorite fitness equipment - I would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical about buying this sandbag because some ppl complained about the sand they put in it falling out. However, after several months of using this sandbag with almost 35 lbs in it, I've found that those complaints were simple user error. I love this sandbag and incorporate it into my weekly fitness routine.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and feels sturdy but filling and weighing the sand bags was frustrating and impossible to get accurate weight. Bags leak despite the amazingly strong Velcro. I cannot fit all 4 fully filled sand bags in easily not change weight of bag quickly and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: K. Madden

product_meta.title: SKLZ Super Sandbag Heavy Duty Training Weight Bag (10 - 40 Pounds)
product_meta.description:
Develop total body strength, stability and endurance by training with the Super Sandbag. This versatile training tool allows you to execute countless training exercises, working your upper and lower body. Develop explosive power on-demand. The removable weight bags can be used as soft weights to increase the intensity of any drill or exercise.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 flag football 

 SKLZ SUPER SANDBAG
Develop total body strength, stability, and endurance with the Super Sandbag training aid. This versatile training tool allows you to execute countless training exercises that work your upper and lower body. You can swing it, lift it, squat it, stabilize it, and pretty much anything else. With the Super Sandbag, you'll develop explosive power on demand. The Super Sandbag comes with four 10-pound weight bags that fit individually or all together in a durable outer shell equipped with a zipper enclosure and Velcro reinforcement. The removable weight bags serve as soft weights to increase the intensity of any drill or exercise. 



EXERCISES (INSTRUCTION GUIDE INCLUDED)

 * Squat 
 * Romanian Dead Lift
   
 * Forward Lunge
   
 * Bicep Curl
 * Clean and Press
   

 



SET-UP INSTRUCTIONS

 * Remove Super Sandbag and yellow weight bags from box.
 * Fill yellow weight bags with desired amount of filler (sand is recommended). Ensure each weight bag is sealed. 
   
 * Insert desired number of weight bags in to Super Sandbag. Each sand-filled bag weights approximately 10 pounds. See video above for more instructions.
 * Begin workout. 
   





ABOUT SKLZ 
SKLZ is committed to elevating the athlete in each of us by guiding and serving athletes on their journeys to be their personal best. As the flagship brand of Pro Performance Sports, based in San Diego California, SKLZ develops innovative athletic performance and skill development training products, technology and knowledge for serious athletes of all ages, skill levels and sports including baseball, football, soccer, golf, softball and basketball. SKLZ is known around the world for delivering durable, high-performance training products used by professional and amateur athletes as well as their coaches and trainers seeking to improve on a sport-specific skill or a performance-focused goal such as speed, agility, balance or core strength.
feature_bullets: Great for strength building throughout body
Four weight bags included – must be filled with a high density material, like sand
Durable outer shells for long lasting use

DEVELOP EXPLOSIVE POWER. Use this multipurpose tool to work both your upper and lower body in countless training exercises. Develop all over strength, maximum power, and explosiveness with the SKLZ Super Sandbag Heavy Duty Training Bag.

DURABLE OUTER SHELL. These weighted sand bags are made for the roughest and toughest drills. With a secure zipper closure, and Velcro reinforcements you can be confident that these training bags won’t break or bust.

EASY TO GRIP HANDLES. Multiple handles allow for versatility and flexibility in your workout. The easy to access handgrips allow you to find force, power, and stability in your movement without distraction.
REMOVABLE WEIGHT BAGS. With four smaller removable weight bags, you can vary the weight from 10-40lbs. Adjust your workout to match your desired intensity for all your endurance drills and exercises.

INVEST IN YOUR STRENGTH. Investing in sports equipment means investing in your training and athletic goals. Use the SKLZ Super Sandbags to develop your power and explosiveness as you build strength throughout your body.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
